title: Royal Enfield sales rise 53 per cent in August
description: Royal Enfield CEO B Govindarajan said the company witnessed incremental volumes following the launch of its new bike Hunter 350 early last month and sales of the model will start across several international markets in the coming months.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
